description:
The module introduces contemporary music repertoire in solo, chamber, and sinfonietta ensemble settings for all orchestral instruments and piano. Students work with coaches in repertoire appropriate for their instrument, learning new techniques necessary for the performance of contemporary works. Participation in rehearsals and concerts by OpusNovus, the conservatoryâ€™s contemporary music ensemble, is required.

This module is mandatory for all students majoring in performance on an orchestral instrument or piano. For those students, the module is generally taken in Year 3 of study.
title: Contemporary Music Performance
